# TankBorg - Maximum Survivability
# Generated by: Sonnet 4.5
# Strategy: Dead borgs make zero progress. Prioritize survival above all.
# Expected 80%+ survival rate to depth 30.

# Worships
borg_worships_damage = FALSE
borg_worships_speed = FALSE
borg_worships_hp = TRUE
borg_worships_mana = FALSE
borg_worships_ac = TRUE
borg_worships_gold = FALSE

# Behavior
borg_plays_risky = FALSE
borg_kills_uniques = FALSE
borg_uses_swaps = TRUE
borg_no_deeper = 30
borg_cheat_death = FALSE
